definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Tanya: I assume we don't need to worry about creating a need, with summer almost here.
sentences.chinese: 我想夏季就要惠臨，我們不用再爲締造需求而擔憂。

sentences.english: Robespierre was the founder of French democratic politics and of virtue.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯斯比爾是法國民主政治的奠基人和關德的締造者。

sentences.english: They were inspirational figures, dreamers of beautiful dreams.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們是靈魂的啓蒙者，是美好夢想的締造者。

sentences.english: And he says that created this incredible opportunity for drug companies.
sentences.chinese: 他還聲稱這爲製藥公司締造了絕妙機會。

sentences.english: He wanted to make one world.
sentences.chinese: 他希望締造一個統一的世界。

sentences.english: Hysan aims to be a financially successful as well as a responsible business.
sentences.chinese: 希慎致力成爲一間締造財務佳績及負責任的企業。

sentences.english: Children of the night. What music they make。
sentences.chinese: 黑夜中孩子的聲音是他們締造的美妙音樂。

sentences.english: Harbert, the founder of American North West Airline, made such remarks.
sentences.chinese: 美國西北航空公司的締造者哈伯曾經如是說。

sentences.english: Building a great business is a marathon.
sentences.chinese: 締造一家偉大的企業就像跑一場馬拉松。

sentences.english: Creating the Brandnew Kitchen and Life Standard Breezily .
sentences.chinese: 輕鬆締造全新的居廚生活標準。
締造和平的人是有福的。

sentences.english: Innovative technical formula can create full and charming lips make-up effect by slight application.
sentences.chinese: 創新技術配方，輕輕一抹締造出更加豐盈魅惑的脣妝。

sentences.english: For two years, deal makers have been searching for signs of that bottom.
sentences.chinese: 兩年以來，交易締造者們一直在搜尋市場觸底的跡象。

sentences.english: Cover with moderate effect, create a perfect 8-hour long-lasting makeup.
sentences.chinese: 具有中度遮蓋效果，締造8小時持久的完美無暇妝容。

sentences.english: Therefore, the spirit of creativity or innovation especially poor.
sentences.chinese: 因此，締造力或創新精神特差。

sentences.english: It was a rare example of a happy, faithful Hollywood marriage.
sentences.chinese: 這締造了一段好萊塢罕見的愉快，忠實的婚姻佳話。

definition: to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
